channel.title: Dan and jon's random bananza
channel.description: This is a weekly podcast in which the hosts; Dan, Jon, and Guest talk about the week, strange and funny things, and interesting and weird news from around the globe. Regular features in the show include Dan's wacky inventions and random rants. Please Email in any questions for us, inventions, or news that you might have found to danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.uk
channel.itunes:subtitle: The weekly show with Jon, dan and a guest, with random rants, interesting news, and wacky inventions.
channel.itunes:author: dan and jon
channel.itunes:summary: This is a weekly podcast in which the hosts; Dan, Jon, and Guest talk about the week, strange and funny things, and interesting and weird news from around the globe. Regular features in the show include Dan's wacky inventions and random rants. Please Email in any questions for us, inventions, or news that you might have found to danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Tuppencast. With dan jon and AMK
item.description: Just skip to the end really, Tuppen Jon and AMK have a race to see who can eat an apple first. It was disguisting. Also, jon and AMK attack Tuppen at various points throughout the show.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: Just skip to the end really, Tuppen Jon and AMK have a race to see who can eat an apple first. It was disguisting. Also, jon and AMK attack Tuppen at various points throughout the show.

item.title: Random podcast - Starring Adam King
item.description:
Recorded a while ago, didn't bother putting it up.
No microphone no notes no features. Enjoy
Oh and it just cuts out at the end
item.dc:creator: dan and jon

item.title: Webisode 8 - Starring Jonny G and George - Final Episode!
item.description: The Final Episode of the series!!! We are joined by two guests, George and John, and we chat about inventions, sport, art, and read out some 'interesting' news. Email us at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.com and stay subsribed for our return!
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: The Final Episode of the series!!! We are joined by two guests, George and John, and we chat about inventions, sport, art, and read out some 'interesting' news. Email us at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.com and stay subsribed for our return!

item.title: Webisode 7 - With Random Phone Calls!
item.description: We ring up our friends at points throughout the shows, and the results are disasterous! We talk about frogs, braces, and the top 10 worst animals. Email us at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.uk, + guess what we'e singing at the end of the show for a prize!!
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: We ring up our friends at points throughout the shows, and the results are disasterous! We talk about frogs, braces, and the top 10 worst animals. Email us at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.uk, + guess what we'e singing at the end of the show for a prize!!

item.title: Webisode 6 - Starring Oli P
item.description: Oli P finally comes on the show today, and we talk about oli being posh, dog umbrellas, the Tate modern, and 'The Mosquito'. Email in at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.ukwith interesting facts and questions for us, or just feedback on the show.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: Oli P finally comes on the show today, and we talk about oli being posh, dog umbrellas, the Tate modern, and 'The Mosquito'. Email in at danandjon_podcast@hotmail.co.ukwith interesting facts and questions for us, or just feedback on the show.

item.title: Webisode 5 - Starring Jon G
item.description: This week, resident boffin Jonny G joins the show and we talk about the snow, chopsticks, American football, and sheep. Regular features suchs as wacky inventions return and john brings his fact book.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: This week, resident boffin Jonny G joins the show and we talk about the snow, chopsticks, American football, and sheep. Regular features suchs as wacky inventions return and john brings his fact book.

item.title: Webisode 4 - The Adam K spectacular
item.description: Its Hedgehog day and we finally get Adam K to join in with the show! Download for talk about Slides, Shops, the News, and interesting facts in our longest Podcast yet.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: Its Hedgehog day and we finally get Adam K to join in with the show! Download for talk about Slides, Shops, the News, and interesting facts in our longest Podcast yet.

item.title: Dan and Jon's random bananza - Webisode 3
item.description: George Skinner Guests on the show. We get our first piece of fan mail this week! Join us as we chat about Poets, George's football boots, and much more. Wacky inventiions and random rants are all also here.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: George Skinner Guests on the show. We get our first piece of fan mail this week! Join us as we chat about Poets, George's football boots, and much more. Wacky inventiions and random rants are all also here.

item.title: Dan and jons random bananza - Webisode 2
item.description: This week we talk about lack of fan mail, our mock results, dans cats, and of course regular features such as random rant make their return.
item.dc:creator: dan and jon
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about lack of fan mail, our mock results, dans cats, and of course regular features such as random rant make their return.
